Comment: Truck drivers are one of the backbones of commerce in this country.  It would be very dangerous to lose any aspect of that infrastructure.  They are worth listening to, and they aren’t a monolith, politically.  Same with farmers.  They aren’t all right wing nut jobs.  Trump’s economic “strategy” is likely to be damaging to them too, and they are not all a bunch of morons.  So don’t go full schadenfreude on those groups.  This country needs them and they are worth listening to.

And with you being in the profession for 6 years, i bet you've met more non-trump supporters than you think (respectfully)   i say all this not to argue but to help you feel a little better. We have a lot more blue-collar support over on the anti-trump side than we realize. It may not feel like it, especially for someone like you in your profession or for me here in rural IL. So. Keep your head up.
